name: Hotline Magneto
description:
You're a magnetic robot who's only desire is to befriend all the other metal things in the world. Sadly, the nasty human soldiers are trying to stop you, and they're using your metal friends against you! Guess you'll have to take back your friends and show those humans what real metal friendship can mean.

-----------------------------------------

Controls:

LMB: Pull Objects/Grab Objects

RMB: Push Objects/Throw Objects

Space: Use Equipped Weapon

WASD: Move

-------------------------------------

We're but simple programmers without an artist, so we used these resources to populate our game world with a fun and consistent art style and sick audio:
